alert.note: Alert for Camas Prairie (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 27 at 3:22AM MST until December 27 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THIS MORNING... ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 25 below zero. For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches. Wind gusts up to 25 mph will cause areas of blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Camas Prairie zone. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, from 11 PM this evening to 11 AM MST Tuesday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 11 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
